prompts: Create a cute Electric-type Pokemon that resembles a small rodent with big ears and whiskers.
I want a design for a Pokemon that has a cheerful demeanor and is primarily orange with yellow accents.
Generate an image of an adorable Pokemon that can be found in urban areas, resembling a fluffy ball.
Make a character for a Pokemon that has playful and energetic traits, perfect for a family-friendly game.
Imagine a tiny Pokemon that loves to explore forests and is known for its vibrant colors and charming appearance.
Design a Pokemon that can evolve into a more powerful form, starting as a small, round creature.
Show me a Pokemon that embodies cuteness and mischief, with a tail that looks like a lightning bolt.
